text: National Highway 347BG, commonly referred to as NH 347BG is a national highway in India. It is a secondary route of National Highway 47. NH-347BG runs in the state of Madhya Pradesh in India. == Route == NH347BG connects Deshgaon, Sanawad, Barwaha and (Bhawarkua Chowk) at Indore in the state of Madhya Pradesh. == Junctions == : Terminal near Deshgaon. : Bhawarkuwa Terminal near Indore. == See also == * List of National Highways in India * List of National Highways in India by state == References == == External links == * NH 347BG on OpenStreetMap Category:National highways in India Category:National Highways in Madhya Pradesh
title: National Highway 347BG (India)
